Description:
Detects the execution of SOAPHound, a .NET tool for collecting Active Directory data, using specific command-line arguments that may indicate an attempt to extract sensitive AD information.


Author: @kostastsale
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - SOAPHound Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '% --buildcache %' or command like '% --bhdump %' or command like '% --certdump %' or command like '% --dnsdump %') and (command like '% -c %' or command like '% --cachefilename %' or command like '% -o %' or command like '% --outputdirectory%'))
